macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Hits Record Levels Amid Institutional Demand
items.summary: Bitcoin reached record highs in early January 2026, driven by strong institutional interest, ETF accumulations, and positive market momentum trading around $88,761 with a 1.4% gain in the last 24 hours.

items.title: $2.2 Billion Bitcoin and Ethereum Options Expire, Testing 2026 Volatility
items.summary: Over $2.2 billion in BTC and ETH options contracts, dominated by $1.87 billion in Bitcoin, are settling today near key strike levels like BTC's $88,000 max pain, potentially sparking volatility.

items.title: Bitcoin Futures See Major Outflows Amid Mixed Momentum
items.summary: Bitcoin shows positive momentum with a 1.4% gain to $88,761, but faces caution from significant futures outflows totaling over $200M in 24 hours and up to $373M in 12 hours.

items.title: Trump's 2026 Pro-Crypto Policies Set Stage for BTC, XRP, SOL Gains
items.summary: Upcoming Clarity Act vote, GENIUS Act implementation, SEC Project Crypto rulemakings, and new CFTC leadership could drive major gains for Bitcoin, XRP, and Solana in 2026.

items.title: Trump's 2026 Tariff Plans Spark Crypto Market Volatility Concerns
items.summary: Uncertainty over US President Trump's new trade tariffs in 2026 is raising fears of heightened volatility for Bitcoin, Ethereum, and altcoins as experts monitor impacts.

items.title: Shiba Inu Open Interest Surges 20% in Early 2026
items.summary: Shiba Inu (SHIB) sees a 20% rise in open interest early in 2026, signaling potential market implications amid volatile memecoin trends.

items.title: Iran Reportedly Eyes Cryptocurrencies for Weapons Sales
items.summary: Iran is considering using cryptocurrencies to facilitate overseas weapons sales, according to recent reports.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: 2025 Marked as 'Year of Reasoning' with Major AI Advances in Multi-Step Planning
items.summary: 2025 was defined by breakthroughs in RLVR techniques and o1-series models that enabled AI systems to perform complex multi-step planning and tool usage. Coding agents like Claude Code have revolutionized developer workflows, while significant corporate transitions occurred including Warren Buffett stepping down as Berkshire Hathaway CEO.

items.title: AI Use in Education Surges with Over 15 Percentage Point Growth
items.summary: New RAND survey data shows sharp increases in AI adoption among both students and educators, with students using AI for assignments and teachers leveraging it for lesson design, grading, and administrative tasks. However, concerns remain about adequate guidance and guardrails for educational AI use.

items.title: Quantum Computing Mapped as Potential Accelerator for Single-Cell Biology Research
items.summary: Penn State and Quantum for Healthcare Life Sciences Consortium researchers outline how quantum computing combined with classical computing and AI could overcome computational limits in analyzing complex biological data. Quantum algorithms may improve spatial analysis, cell behavior modeling, and drug response prediction, particularly in data-limited scenarios.

items.title: Gecko Robotics Emphasizes AI Integration in Infrastructure Technology
items.summary: Gecko Robotics has prioritized artificial intelligence development, reflecting broader industry trends. An MIT study found that 95% of companies adopting generative AI have yet to see measurable returns on their investments.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Five Games Leaving Xbox Game Pass on January 15
items.summary: Microsoft announced that Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn, Neon White, Road 96, The Ascent, and The Grinch: Christmas Adventures will leave Xbox Game Pass on January 15, 2026, with discounts available until then.

items.title: John Wick AAA Game Announcement Incoming
items.summary: Lionsgate Chairman Adam Fogelson revealed that a John Wick AAA video game and a new SAW project will be announced soon.

items.title: Major Video Game Releases Scheduled for January 2026
items.summary: Key upcoming releases include The Legend of Heroes: Trails Beyond the Horizon on January 15, Code Vein 2 on January 30, and others like Arknights: Endfield and The Seven Deadly Sins: Origin later in the month.

items.title: Cloud Gaming Coverage Heads to CES 2026
items.summary: A YouTube channel announced on-site coverage of CES 2026 in Las Vegas, focusing on cloud gaming announcements from Nvidia and industry interviews, alongside January game lists.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.
